Ominous?  It depends on which side of the fence your on?  I have been in a =
position 
of asking for Angels / Gods protection after sensing what was per=
ceived as evil.
Good and evil / Light & darkness can not exist in the same =
space. You can't have 
one without the other. Negativity will always be ove=
rpowered by Good & darkness 
will always be illuminated by the light.  Nega=
tive entities will try to lie and / or mislead?
You can't always know who y=
our dealing with, but that's part of the investigating process,
isn't it?  =
Asking & Trying to determine who your dealing with?

----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: Lisby 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, Decem=
ber 31, 2007 3:53 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon/Frank's Box on=
 YouTube


  That  sounds quite ominous, Zack. Not sure I like the sound of=
 it. What is your theory?



  Ann


  On Dec 31, 2007, at 2:21 PM, Zack Wi=
dup wrote:



    We actually don't know who we're communicating with using=
 the boxes. I 
    suspect it isn't what we traditionally call a "ghost".

=
    I also suspect that people are not hearing their loved ones. The loved =

    oneshave probably been elsewhere for some time ...

    Zack

    On M=
on, 31 Dec 2007, immortallic2 wrote:

    > I personally have seen Chris us=
e his box in public forum four times.
    > I have heard the box give audib=
le yes and no type answers to peoples
    > questions. I do feel though tha=
t the ones that get emotionally moved
    > the most are the ones wanting w=
ith all their heart to hear from a
    > loved one. When these people get a=
n answer that may or may not be
    > heard by all, they feel that it is in=
deed from a loved one and it
    > hits them in the heart as if it was real=
. I would love to hear a
    > recorded session from start to finish as an =
investigator. After all
    > this research is for all not just "30".... :-=
)
    >
